description:
At present nova doesnt exposes the uuid from libvirt as hypervisor-uuid. It becomes an issue when we try to match with other service providers like Cisco UCS. 
Though there has been review put for this and it has been abandoned.
I think there is necessity rising to expose this vital information.

Abondoned review 
https://review.openstack.org/#/c/57295/
